titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to allow passenger ferry boats in nonurbanized areas to qualify for certain grants.
To amend title 49, United States Code, to allow passenger ferry boats in nonurbanized areas to qualify for certain grants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the Department of Transportation to provide formula grants for passenger ferry boat projects in non-urbanized areas regardless of population size.
